sys_ui_action.comments:
Written by Jim Coyne - https://community.servicenow.com/people/jim.coyne
Adds a Form view Context Menu that opens the Xplore: Developer Toolkit in a new tab/window pre-populated with a GlideRecord script template which would return the current record.
Requires the "Xplore: Developer Toolkit" which can be found on the Share site - https://share.servicenow.com/app.do#/detailV2/bbe5dd7213e7de004e8cd4a76144b0ef/overview
sys_ui_action.name: GlideRecord Script - Xplore (scoped)
